00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32.h"
00030 #include "ht32_board.h"
00031 #include "ht32_board_config.h"
00032 
00033 /** @addtogroup HT32_Series_Peripheral_Examples HT32 Peripheral Examples
00034   * @{
00035   */
00036 
00037 /** @addtogroup ADC_Examples ADC
00038   * @{
00039   */

00042   * @{
00043   */
00044 
00045 
00046 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00047 void ADC_Configuration(void);
00048 void EXTI_Configuration(void);
00049 
00050 void ADC_MainRoutine(void);
00051 
00052 /* Global variables ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00053 u32 gADC_Result[3];
00054 volatile bool gADC_CycleEndOfConversion;
00055 volatile bool gADC_SubGroupEndOfConversion;
00056 
00057 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00058 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00059   * @brief  Main program.
00060   * @retval None
00061   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00062 int main(void)
00063 {
00064   RETARGET_Configuration();
00065 
00066   ADC_Configuration();
00067 
00068   EXTI_Configuration();
00069 
00070   /* Enable ADC                                                                                             */
00071   ADC_Cmd(HTCFG_ADC_PORT, ENABLE);
00072 
00073   /* Enable EXTI channel                                                                                    */
00074   EXTI_IntConfig(HTCFG_KEY1_EXTI_CH, ENABLE);
00075 
00076   while (1)
00077   {
00078     ADC_MainRoutine();
00079   }
00080 }
00081 
00082 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00083   * @brief  ADC main routine.
00084   * @retval None
00085   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00086 void ADC_MainRoutine(void)
00087 {
00088   /* Subgroup 0                                                                                             */
00089   if (gADC_SubGroupEndOfConversion)
00090   {
00091     printf("Sequence0:%4u Sequence1:%4u\r\n", (int)gADC_Result[0], (int)gADC_Result[1]);
00092     gADC_SubGroupEndOfConversion = FALSE;
00093   }
00094 
00095   /* Subgroup 1                                                                                             */
00096   if (gADC_CycleEndOfConversion)
00097   {
00098     printf("Sequence2:%4u\r\n", (int)gADC_Result[2]);
00099     gADC_CycleEndOfConversion = FALSE;
00100   }
00101 }
00102 
00103 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00104   * @brief  ADC configuration.
00105   * @retval None
00106   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00107 void ADC_Configuration(void)
00108 {
00109   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00110     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00111     CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO = 1;
00112     CKCUClock.Bit.HTCFG_ADC_IPN = 1;
00113     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00114   }
00115 
00116   /* Configure AFIO mode as ADC function                                                                    */
00117   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_VR_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_VR_AFIO_PIN, HTCFG_ADC_AFIO_MODE);
00118   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_AD2_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_AD2_AFIO_PIN, HTCFG_ADC_AFIO_MODE);
00119   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_AD3_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_AD3_AFIO_PIN, HTCFG_ADC_AFIO_MODE);
00120 
00121   { /* ADC related settings                                                                                 */
00122     /* CK_ADC frequency is set to (CK_AHB / 64)                                                             */
00123     CKCU_SetADCnPrescaler(HTCFG_ADC_CKCU_ADCPRE, CKCU_ADCPRE_DIV64);
00124 
00125     /* Discontinuous mode, sequence length = 3, subgroup length = 2                                         */
00126     ADC_RegularGroupConfig(HTCFG_ADC_PORT, DISCONTINUOUS_MODE, 3, 2);
00127 
00128     /* ADC conversion time = (Sampling time + Latency) / CK_ADC = (1.5 + ADST + 12.5) / CK_ADC              */
00129     /* Set ADST = 0, sampling time = 1.5 + ADST                                                             */
00130     #if (LIBCFG_ADC_SAMPLE_TIME_BY_CH)
00131       // The sampling time is set by the last parameter of the function "ADC_RegularChannelConfig()".
00132     #else
00133     ADC_SamplingTimeConfig(HTCFG_ADC_PORT, 0);
00134     #endif
00135 
00136     /* Set ADC conversion sequence as channel n                                                             */
00137     ADC_RegularChannelConfig(HTCFG_ADC_PORT, HTCFG_VR_ADC_CH, 0, 0);
00138     ADC_RegularChannelConfig(HTCFG_ADC_PORT, HTCFG_AD2_ADC_CH, 1, 0);
00139     ADC_RegularChannelConfig(HTCFG_ADC_PORT, HTCFG_AD3_ADC_CH, 2, 0);
00140 
00141     /* Set EXTI channel n as ADC trigger source                                                             */
00142     ADC_RegularTrigConfig(HTCFG_ADC_PORT, HTCFG_ADC_TRIG_EXTI);
00143   }
00144 
00145   /* Enable ADC cycle and subgroup end of conversion interrupt                                              */
00146   ADC_IntConfig(HTCFG_ADC_PORT, ADC_INT_CYCLE_EOC | ADC_INT_SUB_GROUP_EOC, ENABLE);
00147 
00148   /* Enable the ADC interrupts                                                                              */
00149   NVIC_EnableIRQ(HTCFG_ADC_IRQn);
00150 }
00151 
00152 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00153   * @brief  EXTI configuration.
00154   * @retval None
00155   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00156 void EXTI_Configuration(void)
00157 {
00158   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00159     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00160     CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO = 1;
00161     CKCUClock.Bit.HTCFG_KEY1_GPIO_CK = 1;
00162     CKCUClock.Bit.EXTI = 1;
00163     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00164   }
00165 
00166   /* Configure AFIO mode of input pins                                                                      */
00167   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_KEY1_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_KEY1_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_GPIO);
00168 
00169   /* Enable GPIO input                                                                                      */
00170   GPIO_InputConfig(HTCFG_KEY1_GPIO_PORT, HTCFG_KEY1_GPIO_PIN, ENABLE);
00171 
00172   /* Configure GPIO pull resistor of input pins                                                             */
00173   GPIO_PullResistorConfig(HTCFG_KEY1_GPIO_PORT, HTCFG_KEY1_GPIO_PIN, GPIO_PR_DISABLE);
00174 
00175   /* Connect EXTI channel to GPIO Pin                                                                       */
00176   AFIO_EXTISourceConfig(HTCFG_KEY1_AFIO_EXTI_CH, HTCFG_KEY1_AFIO_ESS);
00177 
00178   { /* Configure EXTI channel n as falling edge trigger                                                     */
00179 
00180     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00181        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00182        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00183     */
00184     EXTI_InitTypeDef EXTI_InitStruct;
00185 
00186     EXTI_InitStruct.EXTI_Channel = HTCFG_KEY1_EXTI_CH;
00187     EXTI_InitStruct.EXTI_Debounce = EXTI_DEBOUNCE_DISABLE;
00188     EXTI_InitStruct.EXTI_DebounceCnt = 0;
00189     EXTI_InitStruct.EXTI_IntType = EXTI_NEGATIVE_EDGE;
00190     EXTI_Init(&EXTI_InitStruct);
00191   }
00192 }

00198   * @param  uline: error line source number.
00199   * @retval None
00200   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00201 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00202 {
00203   /*
00204      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00205      Debug message can be added here.
00206      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00207   */
00208 
00209   while (1)
00210   {
00211   }
00212 }
